parameters.name: Face
parameters.description: Points to a null-terminated string that specifies the name of the font face (for example, Times New Roman)

title: IModelDoc2.FontFace
description: Changes the font face in the selected notes, dimensions, and GTols.

parameters.name: Face
parameters.description: Points to a null-terminated string that specifies the name of the font face (for example, Times New Roman)

remarks:
You can also use
ITextFormat
for full control of text formatting. Obtain ITextFormat using the appropriate GetTextFormat method (see index entry GetTextFormat for a list of available GetTextFormat methods).
